name: Digital Art Tycoon
description:
In this small tycoon game you will travel through the history of digtal art all the way into the future! Can you turn your passion into a viable buisness, can you make your pictures sell? Good luck passing from greyscale into hdr...

Made for Game Factory Jam June 2018... 

This is more of a concept than a full fledged game.

The android version may not work on smaller devices. This will be fixed by final release.
